issues: AtoB is not a bank, but it maintains wallet accounts with an FDIC insured bank.

recommendations.text: Consider expanding the fraud prevention guarantee to cover more scenarios or increasing the coverage limit for larger fleets.
AtoB offers a variety of instant transfer methods for fleet managers to send funds to drivers with 24/7/365 availability, for a 1% fee.

Managers can select between Venmo, PayPal, push to debit, as well as a new Pay by email or text feature, where funds can be sent by email or phone number and the recipient can select the destination of funds.
Consider using AtoB for managing fleet payments and transfers.
